title: You’re not alone.
steps: Pause and take one deep breath.
If overwhelmed, step away from screen for a minute.
Reach out to someone you trust.
If unsafe, call your local emergency number.
disclaimer: Offline crisis card. No medical advice. Call emergency services if unsafe.

title: Stay with the moment.
steps: Look around — name 5 things you see.
disclaimer: This grounding exercise helps calm racing thoughts.
